name: Those Who Fight Further
description: In this game you play as a hip roller skating guy with a gun who fights back against the corporate clones who have taken over the city. Glide through the game on your roller blades and blast your way into the corpo tower to destroy the hivemind of all the clones. I created this game as my final project for the class IMS 213: "Introduction to Game Development" in the spring of 2020 at Miami University.
